item.title: World Happiness EDA
item.description: We notice that log GDP per capita, healthy life expectancy, social support, and freedom of choice have fairly uniformly positive impacts on subjective well-being. Generosity and perceptions of corruption have less obvious relationships to subjective well-being across countries in 2020. Let us look at effects over time. ## Parsed with column specification: ## cols( ## `Country name` = col_character(), ## year = col_double(), ## `Life Ladder` = col_number(), ## `Log GDP per capita` = col_number(), ## `Social support` = col_character(), ## `Healthy life expectancy at birth` = col_number(), ## `Freedom to make life choices` = col_character(), ## Generosity = col_character(), ## `Perceptions of corruption` = col_character(), ## `Positive affect` = col_character(), ## `Negative affect` = col_character() ## ) Letâ€™s see which countries got progressively better over this time period:
